parameters.description: The sort field. if sort param is provided. Can be either asc or desc.
parameters.name: order

parameters.description: The q search term can also contain any combination of the supported issue search qualifiers:
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: The sort field. Can be comments, created, or updated. Default: results are sorted by best match.
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: You can check the current version of media type in responses.
parameters.name: X-GitHub-Media-Type

parameters.description: Is used to set specified media type.
parameters.name: Accept
